item.title: Mew - She Spider
item.description:
KY: 60411

After we go to sleep
our sun rise
I will make it
the truth of
Painfully helping me
cover up things
I wish
I never had found

Confident
tangled up
In a nice life
put the spider
In you
watching in
Disregard
you live a nice life
With the spider
in you
I saved myself
for someone
Somewhere’s
sweet caress
Something
goes wrong
And all I sought
was happiness

Confident
tangled up
In a nice life
put the spider
In you
watching in
Disregard
you live a nice life
With the spider
in you

I saved myself
for someone
Somewhere’s
sweet caress
Something
goes wrong
And all I sought
was happiness
And so
in right wing fashion
We’ll nurture
xenophobia
And be strong
in right wing fashion
With paste
and generosity
Because no one is safe
from someone
Somewhere’s
sweet embrace
And so I
have simply
Decided to dislike
you now
